dict.acceptation: 信；证书，许可证；字母，文字；字面意义；
用字母标明；写字母于；加标题；

sent.orig: Fundamentalists condemned Seymour for focusing on the Spirit rather than the Letter.
sent.trans: 正统派指斥西摩专注于圣灵(Spirit)，胜于经文(Letter)。

sent.orig: To capitalize a letter, hold the letter key until the capitalized letter appears.
sent.trans: 要输入某单个大写字母，按住该字母键不放直到它变成大写字母。

sent.orig: Most man likes the receiving letter, but seemingly nobody likes writing the letter.
sent.trans: 多数人喜欢收到信件，但似乎没有人喜欢写信。

sent.orig: She sent him letter after letter to explain the delay.
sent.trans: 她一封接一封地给他寄信解释推迟的原因。

sent.orig: If the letter is long, print hard copies of the letter frequently while writing it.
sent.trans: 如果信函很长，在撰写过程中要经常打印几个副本来备份。
